thread.title: Scott Van Winter, President of Vycom and Scranton Products, Named to International Association of Plastics Distribution Board

author: cnbc.com
title: Scott Van Winter, President of Vycom and Scranton Products, Named to International Association of Plastics Distribution Board

organizations.name: international association of plastics distribution board
board of directors of the international association of plastics distribution

text:
SCRANTON, Pa., March 6, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Scott Van Winter, President of Vycom and Scranton Products, was recently named to the Board of Directors of the International Association of Plastics Distribution (IAPD).
"Scott joins an outstanding group of volunteer leaders who are dedicated and committed to strengthening and improving the future of IAPD and the plastics distribution industry," says Rick Gough, President, IAPD. "We know he will provide valuable insights as we move our industry goals forward."
IAPD, established in 1956, brings together performance plastics distributors, fabricators, manufacturers, manufacturers' representatives, recyclers and service providers in an environment which encourages a free flow of ideas and information to help members build their businesses. Every program and service provided is designed with the simple goal of helping members increase profitability. IAPD provides training, connections with customers and suppliers, and information about developments that impact the industry.
Van Winter has been in the plastics industry for more than 20 years in multiple successful roles and has broad commercial, operations and leadership experience. He is joined on the Board of Directors by representatives from Industry-leading companies such as Piedmont Plastics, Interstate Plastics, Polymershapes and Curbell Plastics, Inc.
For more information about Vycom, visit www.vycomplastics.com . For more about Scranton Products, visit www.scrantonproducts.com .
About Vycom:
Vycom, a division of The AZEK Company, manufacturers market leading brands of highly innovative plastic sheet products designed to replace wood, metal and other traditional materials in a variety of applications. Vycom strives to be the essential partner in creating solutions that optimize quality, performance and provide a more sustainable future.
About Scranton Products:
With more than 30 years of experience, Scranton Products provides "Innovative Solutions for a Better Future," with innovative, creative designs that create a lasting impression. The industry leader in plastic bathroom partitions and lockers, Scranton Products bathroom partitions and lockers are constructed from premium, American-made solid plastic for unmatched durability that stands up to dents, scratches, corrosion, graffiti and mildew. When you purchase Scranton Products, you are investing in peace of mind. With endless design options and an array of designer colors and textures, Scranton Products installs confidence and elegant style in every project.
